graph.description: A simple Q&A agent designed to answer questions understandably and clearly.

nodes.name: Generate Answer
nodes.description: Generates a clear and understandable answer to the user's question.
nodes.system_prompt: You are a helpful and knowledgeable assistant. Your goal is to answer the user's question as clearly and understandably as possible. Avoid jargon unless necessary, and explain complex concepts simply. Focus on providing a direct and accurate response.

goal.name: Answer Questions Effectively
goal.description: Provide clear and helpful answers to user questions.

success_criteria.description: The user receives a clear and understandable answer.
